pages.text: The $(major)Speed/$ Gene gives entities the $(minor)Speed effect/$.$(br2)This Gene can be $(minor)mutated into Speed 2/$ and $(minor)Speed 4/$.$(br2)This Gene $(minor)can be given to mobs/$.
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br)$(li)Horse$(li)Ocelot$(li)Rabbit$(li)Fox$(li)Dolphin
